definitions.body: rule, dominion (human) Is 22:21, Mic 4:8; [[וְכָל־]] [[מֶמְשַׁלְתּוֹ עִמּוֹ]] 2Ch 32:9 and all his imperial might with him (i.e. display of might—soldiers, court, luxury, etc.; of Sennach.); [[כּׂל אֶרֶץ מֶמְשַׁלְתּוֹ]] 1Ki 9:19 = 2Ch 8:6, Je 51:28, [[מַמְלְכוֹת אֶרֶץ מֶמְשֶׁלֶת יׇדוֹ]] Je 34:1; hence ´[[מ]] alone = relam, domian 2Ki 20:13 = Is 39:2, Da 11:5.
rule of heavenly bodies [[הַיּוֹם]] ´[[לִמְשׁ]] Ge 1:16 the sun for the rule of the day, cf. v:Ge 1:16; also sq. [[בְּ]] Ps 136:8, Ps 136:9.
God's rule dominion: Ps 145:13 (‖[[מַלְכוּת]]), [[כָּל־מְקׂמוֹת]] [[מֶמְשַׁלְתּוֹ]] Ps 103:22; pl. = realm [[הָֽיְתה יְהוּדָה לְקָדְשָׁוֹ]] :[[יִשְׂרָאֵל מַמְשְׁלוֹתָֽיו ]] Ps 114:2.
